video.title: Chuggington
video.synopsis: Follow the adventures of Koko, Wilson and Brewster, three engines-in-training learning to ride the rails of life to become full-fledged chuggers!

episodes.synopsis: Koko needs help when she offers to replace Harrington on the night shift; Wilson transports Ebo the elephant to the park in order to get a new badge.
episodes.title: Can't Catch Koko / Wilson and the Elephant

episodes.synopsis: The town is in chaos when the depot clock is broken, and Eddie is determined to fix it; Brewster learns that patience can bring great rewards.
episodes.title: Eddie Finds Time / Brewster Knows Best

episodes.synopsis: Hodge and Koko compete to see who can do the most chores in one day; Brewster is afraid that his work will make him late to see his hero's new movie.
episodes.title: Helpful Hodge / Action Brewster

episodes.synopsis: Wilson damages a wheel while playing and is afraid to go to the repair shed; Old Puffer Pete takes the trainees on a tour of the old ghost town.
episodes.title: Clunky Wilson / Old Puffer Pete's Tour

episodes.synopsis: Koko assists Dr. Gosling by watching one of the animals in the safari park; Zephie gets the important job of transporting a visiting reporter.
episodes.title: Koko On Call / Zephie Ace Reporter

episodes.synopsis: Zephie takes over some of Brewster's jobs without asking; Action Chugger is called away on an emergency, and Brewster tries on one of his jet packs.
episodes.title: Brewster's Little Helper / Jet Pack Wilson

episodes.synopsis: Mtambo wants to have adventures so that he can tell new stories; Brewster has to do an emergency run to rescue Chatsworth when he gets stuck.
episodes.title: Mtambo's Amazing Adventure / Brewster to the Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Wilson plays with the controls of a new weather simulator and causes a big storm; Wilson needs help from Old Puffer Pete to use the paint wagon.
episodes.title: Wilson and the Wild Wind / Wilson and the Paint Wagon

episodes.synopsis: Koko disobeys instructions to investigate an underground tunnel with Brewster; Hodge has to believe in himself so that he can repair a broken track.
episodes.title: Koko and the Tunnel / Hodge the Magnet

episodes.synopsis: Wilson learns how to brake in mud but doesn't want to go through the chugwash afterward; Harrison discovers how important it is to follow the rules.
episodes.title: Wilson Gets A Wash / Training Time Harrison

episodes.synopsis: Wilson gets distracted while carrying a cargo and forgets his duties; Koko is in charge of the depot but hasn't paid enough attention to instructions.
episodes.title: Wilson and the Ice Cream / Koko Takes Charge

episodes.synopsis: Olwin and Morgan give Zephie a siren in case she gets lost again; all the trainees put on a big show to celebrate Puffer Pete's 150th anniversary.
episodes.title: Zephie's Zoomaround / Puffer Pete's Big Show

episodes.synopsis: Wilson's cargo of special paper gets ruined when he plays in a broken water pipe; Koko makes a mess of things while hauling wood to the paper mill.
episodes.title: Wilson's Paper Trail / Koko and the Squirrels

episodes.synopsis: When Brewster delivers food to the safari park, he unknowingly brings back a stowaway; a visiting nurse teaches the trainees about the ambulance car.
episodes.title: Brewster Goes Bananas / Nurse Wilson

episodes.synopsis: The trainees want to help Eddie when he gets in trouble for being late to work; Olwin rescues the trainees when they get trapped by a heavy fog.
episodes.title: Late Again Eddie / Outward Bound Olwin

episodes.synopsis: Wilson is having difficulties learning how to give passengers a smooth ride; Brewster believes Emery when he teases him that dragons are real.
episodes.title: Wilson's Smooth Moves / Brewster and the Dragon

episodes.synopsis: The trainees have to pull and roll stock around a tricky obstacle course; Emery thinks he can get famous when a television crew visits Chuggington.
episodes.title: Watch Out Wilson / Famous Emery

episodes.synopsis: Olwin has trouble with some bubbles when she tries to look her best for a photo; M'tambo gives a tour of the safari park to the King of Buffertonia.
episodes.title: Bubbly Olwin / Mtambo's Royal Tour

episodes.synopsis: Frostini gets help from an unusual source when making a new flavor of ice cream; the trainees misunderstand something they have overheard about Pete.
episodes.title: Frostini's Fruit Fandango / Poor Old Puffer Pete

episodes.synopsis: The trainees swing into action to clean up the depot on annual inspection day; Chatsworth has a hard time taking a nap after a long day of work.
episodes.title: Inspector Emery / Rock-a-Bye Chatsworth

episodes.synopsis: Wilson is too impatient to listen to Mtambo's full instructions about giving park tours; Brewster comes up with a fun new hobby: people spotting!
episodes.title: Wilson's Wacky Tour / Brewster's Hobby

episodes.synopsis: When Koko finds a lost puppy, she decides to keep it; it's Old Puffer Pete to the rescue when Wilson's ice-cream car breaks down during a test.
episodes.title: Koko's Puppy Training / Bang Klang Wilson

episodes.synopsis: Wilson is thrilled to have the chance to assist Frostini, the ice-cream chugger; Koko doesn't do well when the trainees take the passenger test.
episodes.title: Cool Wilson / Koko Pulls It Off

episodes.synopsis: Wilson stays up all night and then has difficulty completing his run on time; Hodge causes problems when he tries to finish his duties without Eddie.
episodes.title: Wake Up Wilson / Hodge's Secret

episodes.synopsis: Brewster's impatience when getting a load from the stone quarry lands him in big trouble; the trainees help find a new firebox for Old Puffer Pete.
episodes.title: Braking Brewster / Old Puffer Pete's Firebox

episodes.synopsis: Silly Zephie becomes afraid of the monkeys in the safari park; kindly Koko gives up her chance to win a championship race in order to help Wilson.
episodes.title: Zephie's Monkey Business / The Chugger Championship

episodes.synopsis: As the trainees face their first blizzard, an avalanche traps Harrison in a tunnel; Calley has an emergency, so Brewster becomes a substitute teacher.
episodes.title: Snowstruck Wilson / Emergency Emery

episodes.synopsis: Harrison needs help when he gets stuck trying to plow a snowdrift. When Action Chugger comes to town to make a film, he hires Emery as his assistant.
episodes.title: Heave Ho Harrison / Lights, Camera, Action Chugger

episodes.synopsis: The steam engines need Wilson's assistance. When Hodge tries to help Eddie with his list of jobs on a very windy day, he is literally blown away.
episodes.title: Wilson and the Steam Team / Hodge Sails Away

episodes.synopsis: Koko and Zephie paint hideous designs on each other, but their pranks backfire; a power failure on a hot day threatens to melt a load of ice cream.
episodes.title: Koko's New Look / Frostini's Meltdown

episodes.synopsis: Scared that a meteorite will escape from the museum and cause harm, Hoot and Toot try to send it back into space; Eddit and Hodge clean the tunnels.
episodes.title: Next Stop Space / Scrub-a-Chug

episodes.synopsis: Emery takes a reporter around town, hoping to get his picture in the paper. Hoot resents that Toot is always leading, so Toot agrees to switch places.
episodes.title: Stop the Press, Emery / Hoot v. Toot

episodes.synopsis: Seeking out photos he can shoot to promote Chuggington, Wilson sees Hoot and Toot toting a robotic dinosaur. Hodge gets a chance to host Quiz Night.
episodes.title: Wilson and the Dinosaur / Quizmaster Hodge

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Ling gets Brewster to test her invention, intended to help chuggers boost their speed. When a storm pounds the tracks, Koko tries to de-ice them.
episodes.title: Booster Brewster / Chilly Chuggers

episodes.synopsis: When the signal from Dr. Ling's ChugNav goes off track, Hodge tries to fix it himself; while operating the juicer car, Zephie collides with a beehive.
episodes.title: Hodge & the ChugNav / Zephie & the Bees

episodes.synopsis: Toot feigns illness to avoid doing track inspection with Hoot. Wilson and Koko are sent out into the icy winter chill to sand the mountain tracks.
episodes.title: Toot's Tall Tale / Wilson's Icy Escapade

episodes.synopsis: Brewster carries the new mayor across a bridge to her welcoming ceremony; when the fault detector fails, Emery replaces the device and annoys Vee.
episodes.title: Brewster Meets the Mayor / Fault Finder Emery

episodes.synopsis: Wilson uses the new rolling reporter car to make a live news broadcast; Koko tries to become the first trainee to win the High Speed badge.
episodes.title: Rolling Reporter Wilson / A Pat on the Paintwork

episodes.synopsis: The new mayor and her nephew watch the chuggers to decide which of them deserves a prestigious award. Action Chugger teaches the trainees some stunts.
episodes.title: Chugger of the Year / Stunt Brewster

episodes.synopsis: Wilson has to admit that he needs help collecting pumpkins; Mayor Pullman has a fun request for Brewster: make a movie about Chuggington!
episodes.title: Special Helper Wilson / Movie Maker Brewster

episodes.synopsis: Wilson accidentally gets magnetized and is unhappy with the results; Toot is jealous when a new trainee takes up residence in her compartment.
episodes.title: Magnetic Wilson / Toot's New Friend

episodes.synopsis: Wilson disguises himself as a parrot, which scares the safari park animals; Action Chugger learns how hard it is to work without his superpowers.
episodes.title: Chug-o-flare / Under Cover Action Chugger

episodes.synopsis: Hoot and Toot create problems when they try to earn some gold wheels; Koko pays too much attention to a video game and not enough to track safety.
episodes.title: Gold Wheels / Koko's Game

episodes.synopsis: Hodge cleverly uses smoke signals to call for help when he breaks down; Brewster is sad when the chuggers get a new instructor for crane training.
episodes.title: Hodge Can't Wait / Crane Training

episodes.synopsis: Piper learns a valuable lesson when she gets stuck in a tight situation, but Brewster is there to help her; Koko has a hard time keeping a secret.
episodes.title: Wobbly Wheels / Top Secret Koko

episodes.synopsis: Zephie starts her own club but angers her friends by being too choosy about who gets in; everyone wants to join Skylar's new rescue squad.
episodes.title: Zephie's Star Club / Skylar's Squad

episodes.synopsis: Wilson, Brewster and Koko join special squads to further their training. Wilson, a member of the Chug Patrol rescue squad, offers help to Koko.
episodes.title: Chug Patrol: Ready to Rescue

episodes.synopsis: Hanzo teaches Koko to control her new engine booster; Brewster is rewarded when he gives up something he wants to complete an important job on time.
episodes.title: Stop Koko Stop / Brewster Makes Tracks

episodes.synopsis: Brewster's clever thinking helps a friend stranded by a collapsed bridge; Wilson fails a test but redeems himself by skillfully handling an emergency.
episodes.title: Back Up Brewster / Chief Wilson

episodes.synopsis: Brewster's attempts to lay new track are hampered by a big rainstorm; Koko gets lost while transporting important guests, but they have fun anyway.
episodes.title: Track Laying Brewster / Koko the Explorer

episodes.synopsis: Old Puffer Pete needs someone to watch over him when he starts "sleep-riding"; Koko needs help when her booster malfunctions and she can't slow down.
episodes.title: Park Patroller Wilson / Runaway Koko

episodes.synopsis: Wilson learns how to use a new piece of equipment; Brewster and Koko become stranded while using the welder on an old line.
episodes.title: High Rise Rescue / The Old Silver Mine Line

episodes.synopsis: Trouble strikes when the Chuggineers are building a bridge for a new high-speed link, but their teamwork and timing save the day and get the job done.
episodes.title: Chuggineers Ready to Build

episodes.synopsis: Wilson has to master the speed booster wagon to help a friend in danger; the different squads have a great time competing in the Track Dash fun race.
episodes.title: Fearless Wilson / Team Trainee

episodes.synopsis: The Chug Patrollers think up a clever solution to rescue Eddie from a bridge; Koko and Brewster come to Chatsworth's aid when he's stuck in a tunnel.
episodes.title: Special Rescue Team / Deputy Chug Patrollers

episodes.synopsis: Wilson must think fast during a fire drill when he runs out of water; it's up to Wilson and the Chug Patrol to evacuate animals from the safari park.
episodes.title: Blazin' Wilson / Round Up Wilson

episodes.synopsis: Brewster has to take charge of transporting a tunnel-boring machine; Brewster takes his first Chuggineer test and Wilson has safety patrol duties.
episodes.title: Brewster Leads the Way / On Track

episodes.synopsis: Koko is determined to break a speed record at the Chug-a-Sonic Speedtrack; the Chuggineers go up against the Steam Team in an important competition.
episodes.title: Record Breaker Koko / Iron Chuggers

episodes.synopsis: Winter has come to Chuggington, and while the trains prepare for the big parade, Wilson rescues Fletch, who is trapped in a tunnel by a snowdrift.
episodes.title: Snow Rescue
